## SortFields interface

SortFields contains a default value for sort fields and all available sort fields.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SortFields 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [default?](./magento-api.sortfields.default.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Default value of sort fields. |
|  [options?](./magento-api.sortfields.options.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[SortField](./magento-api.sortfield.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Available sort fields. |
